DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study validate EEG base algorithm system detect monitor change cerebral electrophysiological parameter compare clinical evaluation patient undergo Carotid Endarterectomy . The secondary objective measure time ICA clamp algorithm asymmetry detection , time clinical deterioration algorithm asymmetry detection Thi study prospective , open label , single arm , self control , single center study . This study conduct 50 subject accord inclusions/exclusions criterion .
DOC.brief_title: Validation Neurokeeper 's Algorithm Patients Undergoing Carotid Endarterectomy
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year old . Primary Carotid Endarterectomy local anesthesia symptomatic asymptomatic patient . General anesthesia Selective carotid artery shunting . Previous major hemispheric stroke . Any known major hemispheric lesion . Significant movement disorder . Local skull skin affliction prevents electrodes application . Any known condition opinion investigator may interfere protocol implementation .
